DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aimed to assess whether postoperative gum chewing improve intestinal functions.
DOC.brief_title: Gum Chewing and Postoperative Intestinal Function After Gynecolgic Operations
DOC.detailed_description: We will randomize patients into two groups after gynecologic operations. One group will chew gum, the other group not and we will assess the gastrointestinal function functions.
DOC.criteria: Women underwent gynecologic operation Women who are eligible for gum chewing Women with previous gastrointestinal intervantion Women with previous abdominal surgery
